bill.summary:
Condemns the violence, persecution, and murders of peaceful protesters by the government of Nicaragua.
Calls on the United States to continue to condemn the atrocities in Nicaragua, demand the release of individuals wrongfully detained, and identify individuals whose involvement in the violence qualifies for the imposition of sanctions.
